Notes: `Apache`_ version 2.4  or `nginx`_ 1.14 or later are recommended.
Versions 5.7 and 8.0 are supported. Equivalent versions of `MariaDB`_ will also work.
`PHP`_ version 7.2 or better is required. PHP 7.3 or 7.4 is strongly recommended. Note that PHP 8 is not yet supported. This is planned soon.
